lines.text: You son of a bitch! This is for Bodine. You're rotten, Harry. You know why? 'Cos you're a man. All men are filthy. All they ever want to do is to get at you. For a long time I let them get at me. That's why I'm in this dump. But no more. You hear me? I'm not going to let a man's filthy hands touch me again.
You were looking at me through the window. Weren't you?
Did you like what you saw?
Then why don't you take it?
Come on, lover boy, get to work.
[he starts to take off his shirt]
Not the shirt, stupid. Get it up or I'll cut it off!
